title: Amazing Facts About Space
summary: Discover mind-blowing facts about our universe in this short video.

scenes.image: A starry night sky with a prominent full moon
scenes.voiceover: Did you know that the moon is moving away from Earth at a rate of 1.5 inches per year?

scenes.image: A visualization of the Milky Way galaxy
scenes.voiceover: Our Milky Way galaxy contains over 100 billion stars, and it's just one of billions of galaxies in the observable universe.

scenes.image: An astronaut floating in space with Earth in the background
scenes.voiceover: Space is completely silent because there is no air to carry sound waves. Astronauts use radios to communicate in space.
